remarks: Define an operation that produces a finite set of sequential integers. Read " ` M ... N ` " as "the set of integers from ` M ` to ` N ` inclusive."  See ~ fzval for its value and additional comments. (Contributed by NM, 6-Sep-2005.)
statement:
df-fz $p |- ... = ( m e. ZZ , n e. ZZ |-> { k e. ZZ | ( m <_ k /\ k <_ n ) } ) $.
$d k m n $.
